vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire a tract of land containing approximately 43,175 square feet, from Second 55 Venture, LLC, located on Morrell Avenue near its intersection with Sargent Road for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $52,120.00 ($48,120.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund  (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund)
